name: cbvmpt2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s2, s3, c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wceq(c2, c3))
